review: Does not match the descriptions , you cannot get Netflix, and other channelsIt is very good for YouTube
author: wasim a. alhamdani

review: Like everyone else I am happy with the Chromecast but I also bought a Roku around the same time. Comparing the 2 the Roku wins hands down. I know that Chromcast is still new and will need some time to build a developer following so more content is available but unless they start packaging them with a remote control the way Roku does, it just wont compete. Taking out your phone and launching an app just to pause, fast forward, or rewind, is a pain.
author: Brian D "Video Rater"

review: this was my second Chromecast I like my first one so much, I wanted one for the bedroom
author: Kevin Phillips
